column5: Like I said, seems your post got gagged, fish below the rapids where the Petawawa runs into the Ottawa.  This Kitty Cat gave me a good Fight on  six pound test using Fish Guts.  Picture Taken at my Dads place across the Pet River from the CFB Pet Golf Course.   There is sturgeon and Gar and a 35 lb plus pike that was netted in that hole by the MNR.  I also caught a trophy Walleye there in the spring around this time of year
